GSP33bbdip13u:1034: kintvanyeṣāṃ sakalavastūnāṃ bhāvānāṃ svarūpāṇāṃ sthaulyādidharmāṇāṃ vyāvṛtteḥ ananyāpekṣārāhityasya 'asthūlam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1035: ityādinākṣare kathanādapyakṣaraṃ brahmaiveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1067: mīyante ebhiriti mātrā indriyāṇīti ṭīkokteḥ amātraṃ cakṣurādīndriyarahitamiti vyāsatīrthīyoktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1072: annādikaṃ śubhamaśubhaṃ vā sāśanānaśanatvena naradevau yathoditau /
GSP33bbdip13u:1080: 'asthūlo 'naṇuramadhyamo madhyamo 'vyāpako vyāpako yo 'sau harirādiranādiraviśvo viśvaḥ saguṇo nirguṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1120: naiṣa doṣaḥ - yataste yatra bhagavadapekṣayaiva santi /
GSP33bbdip13u:1130: loke sarvapadārthānāṃ prākṛtaparimāṇasyaiva darśanādityata āha - asthūleti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1137: loke parasparaṃ viruddhāḥ sthūlatvāṇutvādayo dharmāḥ svarūpabhūtā yasya saḥ tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1141: iti brahmāṇḍe ityasya uktatvāt yuktā ityadhyāhāreṇa te dharmāḥ viṣṇoryuktā eveti pūrvavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1151: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛsya viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati - saditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:1165: anena janmādhikaraṇoktakāraṇatvasya viṣṇvanyasmin pradhāne ākṣepāttenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1171: tatsṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ pralaye sacchabdoktaṃ brahmaivāsīt svātantryeṇeti śeṣaḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:1176: 'tadā'; suptau satā sampanno bhavati supta iti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1178: atra prakaraṇe śrutānāṃ brahmalakṣaṇānāṃ pradhāne 'sambhavena brahmaṇo 'pi pratipādyatvena pradhānamātrasya pratipādyatvānabhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:1199: sa hi 'avikārassadā śuddho nitya ātmā sadā hariḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1202: vikāritvapratītāvapi kuto 'yaṃ na viṣṇurityata āha - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1206: tattvena niścitastasmāt tadasambhavāt pradhāne ca tatsambhavāt atra ca vikārapratīteḥ tatsat na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1238: anena atra sadevetyādisthāne sacchabdenocyamānaḥ sa viṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip13u:1242: itīkṣaṇākhyakriyākartṛtvaśravaṇādīkṣitṛtvasṛṣṭyādikriyayorvā śravaṇājjaḍaprakṛtau ca tadasambhavāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1243: sūtre sacchabdeneti śeṣaṃ vinā sa ityasyāvṛttiḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1254: nanvīkṣaṇakartṛtvaṃ viṣṇuvatpradhānasya kiṃ na syādityataścetanasyāpi iha hetutvenābhimataṃ mukhyekṣaṇaṃ na sambhavati,
GSP33bbdip13u:1270: iti smaraṇāt jñānopādānatayā siddhe pradhāne tatkartṛtvāsambhavena tatra tasyāmukhyatvādityata āha - bahutvaṃ ceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1274: tathā ca bahutvasya sāvakāśatvāt na tadbalenar ikṣatergauṇatvaṃ kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:1281: vikāraṃ vinaiva niyāmakasvarūpabahutvenaiva mukhyapratipādyenaiva yuktamityuktam iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1293: brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantara ākāśaḥ ..... kiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:1295: 'ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca
GSP33bbdip13u:1299: atrādhikaraṇe sarvādhāratayānveṣṭavyatayā ca sākṣādvā vyavadhānena vā sāmānyato hṛtpadmasthatvaliṅgasya brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ kriyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1300: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - candreti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1308: chandogaśrutau yadakṣaranayodāhṛtavākyoktaṃ candrādityādhāratvaṃ tadeva tathā tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ ca ākāśasya 'atha';
GSP33bbdip13u:1317: evaṃ sarvādhāratvānveṣṭavyatvasamānādhikaraṇaḥ sākṣādvyavadhānena vā sāmānyato hṛtpadmasthatvarūpo viṣayaśca darśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1319: iti bhāṣyeṇa sa candrādityādyādhāraḥ kiṃ daharākāśaḥ syāt?
GSP33bbdip13u:1321: iti tattvapradīpena ca virodha iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1322: tayorakṣarādhikaraṇākṣepeṇa atra pūrvapakṣa iti darśayituṃ pravṛttatvena viṣayapradarśanāyāpravṛttatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:1323: 'ākāśasya'; ityanena prasiddhabhūtākāśasyaiva sarvādhāratayā sākṣāt hṛtpadmasthatvamiti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1324: tathā praśnaprativacanapūrvakaṃ sākṣādākāśasyaivātra sarvādhāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvakathanāditi pūrvapakṣayuktiśca pradarśitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1325: atra yadyapi 'atha yadidamasmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ tasmin yadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1326: taṃ cadbrūyuḥ...... kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadvā va vijijñāsitavyamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1336: ityetat brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ nivāsasthānamiti brahmaiva pūrṇatvātpuramiti ca dvedhā vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1340: tathā ca etasmin brahmapure śarīre yatpuraṃ brahmāsti 'asmin';
GSP33bbdip13u:1361: na ca brahmapure brahmaṇo veśmetyuktyaivākāśasya brahmatvaniścayātpraśnāyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1368: nanvaṇau tasmin kathaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādyavasthitirityatastasya vyāptatvamāha - yāvāniti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1370: tadākhyo bhagavān guṇataḥ parimāṇataśca yāvān eṣa āntaro 'pi tāvāneva /
GSP33bbdip13u:1371: tathā cāṇāvapi rūper iśaśaktyā mahattvasyāpi sattvādvyāptasya tasyānekādhāratvaṃ yujyata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1372: anyaparityāgenāsyaiva jijñāsyatve ko heturityato 'sya sarvādhāratvākhyaṃ mahimānamāha - ubha ityādinā //
GSP33bbdip13u:1373: asminnantare ye ubhe muktāmukte dyāvāpṛthivyau devyau 'samāhite';
GSP33bbdip13u:1376: tathā ubhau muktāmuktau sūryācandramasau vidyut nakṣatrāṇi ca samāśritānīti chāndogyabhāṣyarītyā śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1381: tathā ca padme brahmāstītyukte 'pi tadbrahma kiṃ prakāramiti bhāvena punaḥ 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:1384: anena ca yadbrahmānveṣṭavyatayoktaṃ tadbrahmāntarhṛdaye yāvāneṣa prasiddhākāśastāvān sarvo 'pyākāśo vartate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1386: apahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaṃ ca tadityevamākāśādisarvāśriyatvādapahatapāpmatvādiprakāra ukto bhavatīti prakārāntareṇa vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1388_0: iti padaṃ saptamyantaṃ kṛtvā daharākāśastho vyāptākāśo 'nveṣṭavya iti vā ākāśaḥ iti
GSP33bbdip13u:1388_2: taṃ viśiṣya jijñāsyatvena tatra dyāvāpṛthivyādikamucyata ityāha /
GSP33bbdip13u:1397: iti nyāyena viṣṇutvena viṣṇoreva hṛtpadmasthvaṃ sidhyatītyata āha - sa ceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1400: tathā ca yassarvādāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvena ca śrutyuktaḥ 'sa cākāśo na viṣṇuḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1402: kuto vā na viṣṇurityata āha - tasyānta iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1403: sa cetyanuṣaktaścaśabdo 'tra buddhyā viviktasuṣirapadenānvīyate 'vadhāraṇe ca ayam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1407: suṣiraśabdaśravaṇāt suṣirasya chidrātmakaprasiddhākāśasyaiva śruteḥ sarvādhāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvokteḥ tatsamākhyānādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1432: ādipadena 'viśoko 'vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1442: viṣṇureva na bhūtākāśādiriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1446: ata eva na tatkāryaṃ jarādikamasyetyucyate - vijara ityādinā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1455: tasya yadiṣṭaṃ tatsvataḥ eva bhavediti satyakāmaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1458: ya evaṃ bhūtaḥ so 'nveṣṭavya iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1485: anyatra pāpādyabhāvasya kathañcidyoge 'pi sarvathā satyakāmatvādikaṃ na yujyata iti jñāpanāyādiśabdabahuvacanayoḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1493: 'svataḥ'; anyānapekṣayā nityaṃ tīrṇā aśanāyādayo yena sa harireka eva, nānyo 'sti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1505: nanu ramādiṣvapahatapāpmatvādīnāmanyānadhīnānāmabhāve 'pi yathā kathañcitsattvādanyagataistaiḥ kathaṃ viṣṇutvaniścaya ityata āha - sāpekṣeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1513: tathā ca vivakṣitaliṅgasyānyatrābhāvāttena viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1519_1: sākṣādvābhimānidvārā vā yathākathañcidvṛttāvapi na kathañcidanyatra satyakāmatvādyastīti
GSP33bbdip13u:1523: viṣṇau tadbhāvasya tadanyasmin tadabhāvasya ca pratipādanāya vakroktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1526: tathā cāpahatapāpmatvaṃ svataḥ parādhīnaṃ ceti yathā dvividhaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1531: ataḥ satyakāmatvādivivakṣayā viṣṇoreva hi te guṇā ityuktaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1535: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca / BBs_1,3.15 /
GSP33bbdip13u:1544: brahmalokaṃ brahmaṇo viṣṇorāvāsasthānabhūtaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ taddvārā tatratyaṃ brahma sākṣāllokapadoktaṃ brahmākhyamāśrayaṃ vā 'na vindanti';
GSP33bbdip13u:1550: aharaho hṛdgataṃ brahmalokaṃ prati gatiḥ prāptiḥ 'ucyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:1553: ityatrāpi taditi padaṃ buddhyā vivicya vipariṇāmena sambadhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1554: tathā ca tasmin prāpyamāṇe hṛdgate brahmaloke 'brahmaśabdaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1577: tathā ca suptaprāpyatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvena śrutiprasiddhatvāt tena viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1592: na ca gatiśabdayorivāsya sannidhau hṛtpadmasthasyānukterasiddhyanivṛttiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1593: hṛtpadmasthasya brahmaṇa āvāsatvena nimittena tallokabhūte hṛtpadme 'etaṃ brahmalokam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1594: iti prayuktasya brahmalokaśabdasyāṇyāśrayaloke 'pi prayogāttanmukhena tādṛśalokavattvarūpaliṅgasya hṛtpadmasthabrahmaniṣṭhatāyā prāptatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:1599: tathā ca brahmaṇo viṣṇorloke śvetadvīpe araṇyākhyārṇavau sudhāsamudrau arṇavopame sudhāsarasī vā sta iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1602: araśca vaiṇyaśca sudhāsamudrau tatraiva sarvābhimatapradau dvau /
GSP33bbdip13u:1605_1: viṣṇulokaikaliṅgatvena smṛtisiddhatvādityāśayena sautrahiśabdābhipretāṃ smṛtiṃ darśayati - araśceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1620: yadvā - brahmalokamiti hṛtpadmasya viṣṇulokatvokteḥ tadantargato viṣṇurityuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1623: iti vākye prayogādatra hṛtpadme prayuktam 'etaṃ brahmalokam';
GSP33bbdip13u:1626: iti śrutāvapi brahmalokapadaṃ kuto viṣṇulokaparamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1628: athāpyaraṇyāśrayatvasya bhagavallokaliṅgatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - araśceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1629: asmin pakṣe sautraṃ liṅgapadaṃ hṛtpadmasthasya brahmatvarūpapradānasādhye hetutvābhāvātsūtre liṅgaśabdena pṛthaguktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1630: pūrvavyākhyāne 'pi gatiśabdayorivāsya liṅgasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatāyā upapādanasāpekṣatvena spaṣṭatvābhāvādgatiśabdaliṅgairityanuktvā liṅgaṃ ceti pṛthaguktiryuktā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1633: iti vākye hṛtpadmasthaniṣṭhatayā śrutābhyāṃ suptaprāpyabrahmaśabdābhyāṃ ca dahare viṣṇureveti jñāyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1638: viṣṇuliṅgatvena smṛtisiddhamaraṇyāśrayalokavattvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ hṛtpadmasthe viṣṇuloke prayuktabrahmalokapadasya hṛtpadme prayogāt 'dṛṣṭaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1661: tathā ca ya ātmā hṛtpadmasthatvenoktaḥ sa eṣa 'eṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1680: evaṃ setusamuccāyakasautracaśabdasya yathāśrutānvayena liṅgoktiparatayā dhṛteścetyaṃśaṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ samagraṃ sūtraṃ samānoktirūpasamākhyāparatayā vyācaṣṭe - eṣa iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1685: dhṛtiyuktāyāstadbodhikāyā upalabdheḥ vāsaneyake 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śete sarvasya vaśī'; (bṛ. 6-4-21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1686: ityādyuktvā āmnātāyāḥ 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidharaṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasambhedāya';
GSP33bbdip13u:1688: samākhyāyāḥ kuto viṣṇuparatvamityata āha - eṣa iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:1690: ādiśabdena 'eṣa sarvasya vaśī eṣa sarvasyādhipatireṣa sarveśvaraḥ'; (bṛ. 6-4-21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1716: na cāsya hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ kuta iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1730: ityādyaṃśo bhāṣye dhṛteścetyasya liṅgaparatayā yojanāyāṃ nānvitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1742: iti pratīkagrahaṇena 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1743: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dyāvāpṛthivyau';
GSP33bbdip13u:1748: 'sa hi sarvādhipatiḥ sa hi sarvapālaḥ sar iśaḥ sa
GSP33bbdip13u:1752: nanu samākhyāśrutyuktaḥ sarveśvaratvādimahimā kuto viṣṇoravagata ityata āha - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1776: nanu sarveśvaratvādikaṃ viṣṇuvadanyasyāpi kiṃ na syādityata āha - sarveśa iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1780: tathā ca sarveśvaraḥ sarvapālakaśca viṣṇureka eva nānyo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1781: iti skānda ityasya evakāroktapadādhyāhāreṇa tasyahyeṣa mahimeti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1791: samākhyāntararūpayuktyantareṇa viṣṇorhṛtpadmagatākāśasthatvaṃ sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - prasiddheśceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1800: hṛtpadmasthasya viṣṇutvaprasiddheśca tatsamākhyānādapi daharapadmastho viṣṇureveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1804: iti taittirīyavākyāntare prasiddheśceti sūtrasya yadvṛttyantaraṃ ṭīkāyāṃ sūcitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:1809: ata eva vigatapāpaṃ dehākhyabrahmapuramadhye saṃsthaṃ hṛdayakamalaṃ prakṛtaṃ tattatreti parāmṛśyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1836: tadantassthatveti pāṭhe paramātmanaḥ suṣirāntassthatvamapekṣya śruteḥ pravṛttatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1865: muktabhāvamādāya jīve sambhavāt asiddhivārāṇāya - svata iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:1876: na viṣṇuriti cet - na hṛtpadmastho jīvaḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:1878: asya cāsmin jīve svato 'sambhavāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1900: na, tatra hi parameśvaraprasādādāvirbhūtasvarūpo mukta ucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1903: naitadvākyabalena jīvasya satyakāmatvādiguṇān sambhāvya hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1915: atra muktasyokteḥ hṛtpadmasya ca dehāntaravṛttitayā muktatvāyogāt nāyaṃ jīva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1916: nanvasya muktaviṣayatve 'pi muktasyāpi jīvatve nāstyeva jīve 'pahatapāpmatvādisambhavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1918: yato jīvo bhāvibhāvenāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇaḥ idānīṃ hṛtpadmagatatayocyata ityata āha - parameśvaraprasādāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:1925: tathā ca yo 'tra mukta ucyate sa tu parameśvaraprasādādeva 'āvirbhūtasvarūpaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:1926: āvirbhūto vyaktaḥ svarūpaḥ apahatapāpmatvādiḥ svadharmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1928: ato na daharasthaḥ jīva iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1931: yatprasādātsa mukto bhavati sa bhagavān pūrvoktaḥ// 19 //
GSP33bbdip13u:1940: punaḥ sa ityuktyā sūtre 'nuvṛttasya sa ityasyāvṛttiḥ sūcitā /
GSP33bbdip13u:1941: pūrvokta ityanena sūtre uttaratretyasya pratiyogitayā pūrvatretyupaskāryamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1954: athavā - nanu jīve 'nyādhīnasya tadguṇajātasya sattvātsa evāpahatapāpmatvādinokto hṛtpadmasthaścāstvityata āha - yaditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:1955: yojanā tu - yatprasādātsa jīvo jaḍadehānmukto bhavati,
GSP33bbdip13u:1968: ata evāsyoktaguṇāsambhavābhāvātsa hṛtpadmastho jīva eva neśvara iti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:1971: sa ca dehānantargatatayā na hṛtpadmastho bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1972: na ca muktasyāpi jīvatvena tatrāpahatapāpmatvahṛtpadmasthatvayorbhinnakālīnatve 'pi sāmānādhikaraṇyopapatterasti punastasya prāptiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:1973: yato 'tra vākye yo mukta ucyate sa uttarāduttamātparameśvaraprasādādevāvirbhūtasvarūpo na svataḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:1977: iti pūrvavākye yatprasādātsa mukto bhavati sa paramātmā tathā guṇapradātṛtayocyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:1980: abhivyaktāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ sa tu bhagavāneva pūrvatra 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā'; (chāṃ. 8-1-5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:1982: na muktajīva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:1996: svāpekṣitaṃ bhakṣayan hasanvā jñātibhissaha muktaiḥ ajñātibhiḥ pūrvakalpamuktaiḥ 'krīḍan';
GSP33bbdip13u:2005: yaṃ prāpya svena rūpeṇa jīvo 'bhiniṣpadyate sa eṣa ātmeti
GSP33bbdip13u:2009_1: hṛtpadmasthātmā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya 'itaraparāmarśātsa iti cenna';
GSP33bbdip13u:2010: ityanuvṛttapūrvavākyenāpekṣitasya siddhāntapratijñāyāśca lābhānnetyuktasādhye hetutayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - anyeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2012: iti napuṃsakapadanirdiṣṭasya yamiti pulliṅgena nirdeśo liṅgasyāvivakṣitatvādvā viśeṣyaśabdavivakṣayā vā yuktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2017: jyotiḥ prakāśarūpaṃ paraṃ brahmeti bhinne pade ityapi kecit /
GSP33bbdip13u:2028: yadvā - paramātmana evātmatvavidhānamarthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya sa, tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2033: candrikāyāṃ tu - na kevalaṃ parāmarśasyar iśvarapakṣe bādhakatvābhāvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2037: iti parāmṛśya tasya hṛtpadmasthatvavidhānātsa hṛtpadmastha ātmā jīva eva neśvara iti cet - na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2047: etacchabdastu anyārtha iti tredhāsūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2049: anena jīvaḥ paraṃ jyotirākhyaṃ paramātmānamupasampadyāparokṣato jñātvā atha samīpaṃ prāpyavidyāvidhūnanenānandādinā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate āvirbhūtasvaguṇo bhavatīti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip13u:2051: sa eṣa ātmā ya ātmeti prāguktaḥ paramātmeti hovāca brahmādīn prati rameti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2079: kuto netyataḥ pravṛttaṃ taduktamityaṃśaṃ yata ityadhyāhārābhiprāyeṇa hetutayā vyākhyāti - nicāyyatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:2091: brahmaṇi tu aṃśo 'pi pūrṇa iti kathaṃ tasyāṃśato 'lpaukastvamityataḥ sūtraśeṣaṃ prakarāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe - eṣa ma iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2101: kintu sa jīva eveti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:2103: tatra nicāyyatvāditi pūrvatra tasya sarvagatasyāpi viṣṇorvyomavattadalpasthānasthitatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2107: iti chandogaśrutau tena sarvajyāyastvena vṛddhatamatvena vyāptatvenaiva prakāreṇa tasya viṣṇostaddhṛdayasthatvamuktaṃ smṛtyuktaṃ cāta iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2118: sarvahṛdaye ca ya āste eṣaḥ hṛdayasthāṃśarūpo bhagavān 'jyāyān';
GSP33bbdip13u:2127: vidyā āhiḥ jñaptikāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2145: iti vākyoktaṃ jñānārthaṃ jñeyaprārthanāviṣayatvaṃ vā 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:2146: iti brahmajñānānukūlābhivyaktyākhyabhānaprārthanāviṣayatvarūpaṃ vā ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvaṃ liṅgaṃ brahmaṇi samanvīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:2147: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati - adṛśyatvāditi/
GSP33bbdip13u:2148: 'uktāḥ'; ānandamayādhikaraṇe udāhṛtādṛśya iti vākye iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2151: dvitīyena 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti na bhāti vā'; (kaṭha. 5-14)
GSP33bbdip13u:2166: ata eva tattvapradīpe teṣāmiti prastutiḥ pūrvapakṣotthāpiketyuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2167: tathācetthaṃ yojanā - pūrvamānandamayādhikaraṇe ye 'dṛśyatvādayo guṇāḥ parameśvarasyoktāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2177: tattu dvitīyādiśabdopāttavākyena caśabdena vā sūcitamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2202: sūtre tasyetyasyānukṛterityanenāpi sambandhe tenaivānukaraṇapratisambandhina ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya tatkartuḥ sūryāditejasaśca lābho bhavatīti spaṣṭatvāttadubhayānuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2206: kintu śrutipratīkarūpamapi sarvajagatprakāśakatvaparaṃ cetyāśayena taddhetvantaraparatayā vyācaṣṭe - tasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2211: tathāpi tāpinī pācinī caiva śoṣiṇī ca prakāśinī /
GSP33bbdip13u:2214: sūtre tadanusāribhāṣye ca caśabdo dvitīyasūtrasya vakṣyamāṇavyākhyānabhedena sarvajagatprakāśakatvarūpoktahetusamuccaye vā,
GSP33bbdip13u:2220: anirdeśyaṃ yatsukhaṃ tadrūpa iti vā vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2223: eka ityādau pulliṅgena prakṛtasyaitaditi napuṃsakaliṅgena grahaṇāya rūpaśabdaprayogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2226: vastutastu - vacanāccetiśabdasya sukharūpaścetyapi sambandhe tenaivānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇākhyaḥ sādhyadharmī sūcita iti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2233: yadyapyatra bhāṣye liṅgadvayasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya vā anirdeśyasukharūpasya vā viṣṇutve sādhye sākṣāddhetutvaṃ bhāti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2236: iti vyavadhānena prakṛtaparamātmagrahaṇe liṅgadvayaṃ hetutvena yojitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2237_0: tathāpi hetudvayena tacchabdena jñānisukhaparityāgena paramātmana eva grahaṇasiddhau
GSP33bbdip13u:2237_1: tata eva tacchabdagṛhītasya paramātmana evānirdeśyasukharūpatvaṃ paryavasyatītyāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:2241: kintvanirdeśyaṃ sukhamityatra samīpoktajñānisukhaparityāge heturucyate ityatra jñāpakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2244: eko vaśī sarvabhūtāntarātmā ekaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2247: jñānānandādyabhinnaḥ samābhyadhikaśūnyo vā yaḥ sarvamasya vaśe 'stīti 'sarvavaśī';
GSP33bbdip13u:2253: jñāninaḥ anupaśyantīti prakṛtā ye jñāninasteṣāmeva 'śāśvataṃ sukhaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2262: ityādau prasiddham anirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāmiti manyante ityānukūlyena gṛhṇanti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2265: iti tasya durjñeyatvaṃ ca vadanti jñāninaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2266: tat brahmaṇo rūpaṃ svarūpabhūtaṃ sukhametadekaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karotītiprakṛteśvararūpābhinnamiti manyante jñānina iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2268: taduktaṃ nyāyavivaraṇe - 'yadbrahmānirdeśyaṃ sukhamiti vadanti tadetatsvarūpamiti manyanta iti'; /
GSP33bbdip13u:2275: itthamiti sākalyena nirvaktumaśakyaṃ paramaṃ sukhamiti manyante jñānina iti sukharūpatvavidhiparatayā vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2276: bhāṣye 'pyanirdeśyasukharūpa ityetāvanmātragrahaṇena śrutau sukharūpatvaṃ vidheyamiti sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2277: tadanirdeśyaparamasukhātmakaṃ bhagavadrūpaṃ tatparasādamṛte kimu bhāti na bhāti veti samyagbhāti na bhātīti kathaṃ nvahaṃ jānīyāmiti śiṣṭavākyārthastatraivoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2284: tathā ca kimu bhātīti praśnasyottarabhūtaṃ na bhātītivākyoktamekamajñeyatvarūpamarthamiti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2290: bhagavatprasādādapi kiṃ sākalyena tajjñānaṃ bhavatīti naciketā yamaṃ pṛcchati - kimu bhātīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2304: itivākye ca sarvasya jagatastatprabhāprakāśyatvasya ca śravaṇena asiddhiparihāre kutastayorviṣṇutvasādhyenāvyabhicaritatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2328: tena 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; (kaṭha. 5-15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2342: 'tejaḥ'; ityanena sarvasya jagato nārāyaṇīyaprakāśaprakāśyatvasya coktatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2349: ityānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇaṃ tadetacchabdaparāmṛśyaṃ sukham anirdeśyaṃ sukhaṃ tattu viṣṇurūpameva,
GSP33bbdip13u:2356: tathā tasya sarvasya jagatastasya tatprakāśaprakāśyatvasya 'tasya bhāsā'; (kaṭha. 5-15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2360: ityādiśrutyā smṛtyā ca tasminviṣṇāveva niścayenopapatterjñānisukhe ca 'asambhavāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2362: tathā tasminnupasaṃhāre tasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya 'na tatra sūryo bhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:2363: iti vākye tasya sūryādyaprakāśyatvasyacokteśceti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2370: yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo viddhi māmakam // (gī. 15-12.) iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2383: na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2384: yadgatvā na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama // (gī. 15.6.) iti ca // 23 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2387: kiṃ ca pāṭhake 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamagniḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2392: na jñānisukhamiti sūtrasyārthāntaramapipadasya yuktisamuccayārthatvaṃ cābhipretya tāṃ smṛtimudāharati - na taditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:2409: ityatroktānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya viṣṇutvarūpapradhānasādhye hetūkṛtamanukṛtyādikam 'ahaṃ tattejo raśmīt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2414: iti kāṭhakavākye tasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasyoktaṃ sūryādyaprakāśyatvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya viṣṇoḥ sambandhitvenaiva 'na tat';
GSP33bbdip13u:2417: ityatra viṣṇureva pratipādya iti vā sūtrasyārthadvayamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2419: pūrvaṃ brahma na samyagbhātīti tasya durjñeyatvamuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2420: tatkuta ityataḥ idamucyate - yasyaivaṃvidhaṃ sukhaṃ rūpaṃ 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:2438: vyāsatīrthīyaṃ tu vyākhyānāntaraṃ ṭīkākṛdabhipretaṃ bhaviṣyatīti tadvirodhaḥ // 6 //
GSP33bbdip13u:2451: na ca tatra jijñāsyatvāyogavyavaccheda eva kṛtaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2468: na ca vāyoḥ sarvadevopāsyatve 'pi na viṣṇossarvadevopāsyatvahāniriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2470: na ca śrutigataviśvedevaśabdasya gaṇaviśeṣavācitvāt sarvadevopāsya ityuktiranupapanneti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2472: anenar - iśānaśabdasyānyaniṣṭhatvākṣepamukhena phalato mumukṣukartṛkajijñāsyatvasyānyaniṣṭhatvākṣepāt jijñāsādhikaraṇenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2476: sa ca 'evamevaiṣa prāṇa itarān prāṇān pṛthakpṛthageva sannidhatte';
GSP33bbdip13u:2512: saundaryapradhānāḥ striyo vāmāḥ tāḥ netāraṃ viṣṇuṃ 'viśve devāḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2515: pūrvapakṣī tvidaṃ vāyuparaṃ matvā madhyaśabdo 'yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2527: bhinnān svajanyatvenopacāreṇātmapravibhāgān prāṇān vāyūn pṛthaksthāneṣu hṛdayādiṣu sthāpayatīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2529: tatra hi pūrvaṃ vāgādīnāṃ mṛtyugrastatvamuktvā 'athainameva nāpnot';
GSP33bbdip13u:2533: tathā tatraiva caturthādhyāye 'ayaṃ vāva śiśuḥ yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ'; (bṛ. 4-2-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2534: iti candrikodāhṛte vākye sthūladehākhyavistṛtapradeśagataliṅgaśarīrarūpagṛhe viṣṇurūpāyāṃ sthūṇāyām annākhyena śrīrūpeṇa dāmnā baddho govatsarūpovāyurmadhyamatvenocyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:2535: kuvidaṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devā anavadyāsa āsan /
GSP33bbdip13u:2554: evakāro vāyuliṅgasadbhāvāt vāyureveśānaḥ kiṃ na syāditi codyaparihārāya liṅgebhyaḥ śruteḥ prābalyamāha /
GSP33bbdip13u:2564: kutaḥ? yastatra pramito viṣṇāveva mahāyogavidvadrūḍhibhyāṃ prasiddho 'madhye vāmanam';
GSP33bbdip13u:2571: kutaḥ? yastatra viṣṇāveva pramito mahāyogavidvadrūḍhibhyāṃ prasiddho 'nyatra niravakāśo 'madhye vāmanamāsīnam'; (kaṭha. 5-3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2577: sūtre evakāraprayogena sūcitaṃ śruteḥ prābalyaṃ liṅgasya prābalyaniṣedhamukhena darśayati - na hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2580: tathā ca 'hi'; yasmāt na śruterliṅgaṃ balavat,
GSP33bbdip13u:2585: śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tathā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2586: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ balīyaḥ syādevamāgamanirṇayaḥ / iti skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:2588: kuto na śruterliṅgaṃ balavadityatastathāsati śruterliṅgātprābalyavacanavirodhāpatterityāśayena tadvākyaṃ paṭhati - śrutiriti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2600: atra 'vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ samākhyā ca tathāvidhā';
GSP33bbdip13u:2604: uktaṃ hi pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ - samākhyāditvena grahaṇaṃ 'śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca';
GSP33bbdip13u:2610: 'balīyaḥ'; atiśayena svabhāvato balavat yathātraivādhikaraṇe anantaroddiṣṭaliṅgāpekṣayā pūrvoddiṣṭā vāmanaśrutiḥ svataḥ prabalā/
GSP33bbdip13u:2612: yathā - daharādhikaraṇe daharākāśasya sākṣātsarvādhāratvaprāpakāt 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate ..... ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī'; (chāṃ. 8-1-2,3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2619: yathā - samagropaniṣadar iśvaraparatvasādhakāt ṣaṭpraśnarūpasthānāt prabalam 'ātmata eṣa prāṇo jāyate'; (praśna. 3-3.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2621: ata evātrādhikaraṇe ṣaṭpraśnoktaprāṇavyavasthāpakatvādīnāṃ mukhyaprāṇaliṅgatvamupetya śrutyā bādha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2624: iti nārāyaṇānuvākasamākhyāyāḥ prabalaṃ teṣāṃ viṣṇutvasādhakaṃ brahmaparānekaprakaraṇasandarbharūpaṃ sthānam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2626: ādyayā samākhyayā nirṇetavyaṃ yathā - puruṣasūktasamākhyayā vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2629: viruddhaiteṣāṃ samavāye sati prabalena pūrveṇottarabādhe ca sati 'āgamanirṇayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:2638: tathāpi bāhulyena pūrvapakṣyuktaliṅgānāmapi prābalyātsāmyenānirṇaya evetyata āha - tacceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2644: tathā ca bāhulye 'pi liṅgānāṃ sāvakāśatvāttebhyaḥ śruterekasyā api niravakāśāyāḥ prābalyānnānirṇaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2652: ityatrāntaryāmiparatvaṃ bruvatā sūtrakāreṇetaravyāvṛttyā tasyaiva prāṇatvokteḥ sādhitatvādityapi vyākhyeyametat /
GSP33bbdip13u:2653: tathā ca śrutyantare prāṇaniṣṭhatayā liṅgasyoktāvapi na tadvirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2667: tatroktaliṅgānāmapi tatparatvamupetya teṣāṃ śrutyā bādhasyoktatvāt kathaṃ śrutyantarasthaprāṇavāyuśabdayoḥ viṣṇuparatvāṅgīkāreṇa samādhānam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2672: iti vākyaṃ sthānātprakaraṇasya prābalye udāhṛtamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2679: na ca vyomavatsarvagatasyāpyaṇutvaṃ yujyata iti pratipāditamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2692: tasmādavadhāraṇārthakamātraśabda evāyamaṅgīkāryaḥ uktaṃ hi candrikāyām - mātraśabdasyāvadhāraṇārthakatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:2700: tathā ca sarvagate harāvaṅguṣṭhamātratvoktiranupapanneti nātreśāno viṣṇurityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya tadakṣarāṇi vyācaṣṭe - hṛdīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2706: hṛdi vidyamāno yo 'yamavakāśo 'ṅguṣṭhaparimitadeśastadapekṣayā tatrābhivyaktatāvatparibhitabhagavanmūrtiviśeṣamapekṣya tasya viṣṇoraṅguṣṭhamātratvam astyata iti/
GSP33bbdip13u:2708: hṛdi vidyamānāvakāśamapekṣya tatsambandhāttasyāṅguṣṭhamātratvavacanaṃ yujyata ityāvṛttiṃ vinā yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2709: prathamapakṣe śaktyāparimite 'pi bhagavati mūrtiviśeṣe vyaktyātmanāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya sthānini brahmaṇi tatsambandhādupacāreṇoktiriti bhedaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2710: atra ṭīkāyāṃ hṛdyavakāśāpekṣayeti bhāṣyaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sautratuśabdo 'vadhāraṇatayā vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2713: tattatsthāneṣu vyaktamūrtiviśeṣāpekṣayā vā upacāreṇa vā tattatparimāṇatvoktyā 'yastvetameva prādeśamātram'; (chāṃ. 5-18-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2721: iti kvacidaṅguṣṭhāgrapramāṇakatvoktervirodha iti codyaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2728: mūleśa iti nāmāsmin sarve jīvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
GSP33bbdip13u:2730: prāviśanti suṣuptau tu prabudhyante tatastathā // iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2731: asmin mūleśavyāpinormadhye 'ṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ ca dehe dehāṅguṣṭhamitatvaṃ jīvahṛdi jīvāṅguṣṭhamitatvamiti vivektavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2736: yadi caivaṃ tadā jīvo 'pi jāgradavasthāyāṃ dakṣiṇākṣisthaḥ svapne kaṇṭhadeśasthaḥ suptau hṛdayastho bhavati,
GSP33bbdip13u:2740: kathaṃ ca hṛtkarṇikāmūlagatabhagavadrūpe sadā pratiṣṭhito jīvaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2741: suptau hṛtkarṇikāgragate harau praviśatītyuktiriti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:2742: yatassarvadā hṛdi sthitameva jīvasvarūpaṃ jāgaritādāvakṣyādiṣvapi viśeṣasannihitaṃ dīpaprakāśavadityaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2743: yathoktamaitareyabhāṣye - hṛde sthitameva tasya rūpaṃ jāgarite 'pyakṣyādiṣu viśeṣasannihitaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:2744_1: anekadhā sthitānāṃ bhagavanmūrtīnāṃ śaktyā sarvagānāmapi tatra tatra vyaktyātmanā
GSP33bbdip13u:2744_2: anekālpaparimāṇavattvaṃ ca yujyata iti na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2751: tathā hi kiṃ tattadaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ vā yatkiñcidaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2755_1: manuṣyādhikāratvāt itisūtraśeṣaṃ tuśabdasya kākākṣinyāyena atrāpyanvayaṃ tasyāpyarthatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:2768: sūtre bhāṣye ca manuṣyāṇāmadhikāro yasmin athavā - adhikriyate 'tretyadhikāra upāsanaṃ śāstraṃ vā,
GSP33bbdip13u:2778: ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ manuṣyāṇāmeva vedavidyopāsanādhikāritveneti manuṣyatvaṃ vyāpakatvenoktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2779: na cānadhikāriṇāṃ paśvādīnāṃ dehasthitasya bhagavato 'ṅguṣṭhaparimitatvābhāve parimāṇāntarānukteradravyatvāpattiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2796: tacca mūrtiviśeṣe tanmātratvasya sattvādupacāreṇa vā yujyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:2798: yatkiñcidaṅguṣṭhamātratvoktervyarthatvenāsambhavena ca tattadaṅguṣṭhamātratve vācye tasya ca paśvādīnāmaṅguṣṭhābhāvena tadantargataviṣṇāvayogāditi vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2825: iti śruteśca koṭidvayopasthāpakatvena sandehabījatvāttaduktyaiva devānāmadhikāro 'sti uta nāstīti saṃśayo,
GSP33bbdip13u:2832: tataḥ kimityatassaṃśayabījaṃ vighaṭayan siddhāntayituṃ sūtramavatārayati - tiryagādīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2853: atra taduparīti sādhyadharmisūcakaṃ padamanūdya teṣāṃ tasmāttasyā iti vigrahāśrayeṇa vyācaṣṭe - taduparīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2858: manuṣyāṇāṃ satāṃ devatāpadayogyānāṃ jīvānāṃ padaprāpteḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyaśarīraṃ prāptānāṃ satāṃ 'tasmāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2867: adhikārasambhavo 'pi kuta ityato 'trāpi sambhavādityetadevāvṛttya hetutayā yojayati - viśiṣṭeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2873: na cārthitvābhāvaḥ ityatrāpi teṣāṃ sambhavati hītyeva hetuḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2880: tattvapradīparītyā tātparyajñāpanārthamadhikārādhikyajñaptidārḍhyārthaṃ ca bādarāyaṇaḥ svayameva vaktītyāha iti vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:2882: tathā ca yato na kevalaṃ devādipadayogyajīvānāṃ padaprāpteḥ pūrvaṃ bhūmau kiñcitkālaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ satāṃ tasyāṃ daśāyāmeva adhikāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:2884: tasmānmanuṣyatvādupari tadatyayena tābhyāṃ vidyākarmabhyāṃ tasyāḥ devāditvaprāpteruparitanakāle 'pi devabhāvamāpannānāmapi vedavidyāyāmadhikāro 'styeva /
GSP33bbdip13u:2887: na ca devādīnāṃ viśiṣṭabuddhisāmarthyasadbhāve 'pyarthitvābhāvādadhikārābhāva iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2889: vidyāsādhyajñānamokṣayorarthitvasambhavāditi bhagavān bādarāyaṇo manyata iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2896: tathā sati sūtre 'manuṣyamātravyāvartakamanuṣyapadaprayogena tiryagādivadamanuṣyatvānna devā vedavidyādhikāriṇa ityanumānasūcanāttadvirodhāpatterityata āha - tiryagādīnāmiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2901: anenādhikārābhāve viśiṣṭabuddhyādirāhityasya prayojakatvoktyā paroktāmanuṣyatvahetoḥ sopādhikatvaṃ sādhyavyatirekasādhakopādhivyatirekākhyapratipakṣagrastatvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2902: sautramanuṣyapadaṃ ca mananādiśīlaparaṃ sat viśiṣṭabuddhyādirahitameva cetanaṃ vyāvartayati,
GSP33bbdip13u:2903: na tu martyabhinnamātramiti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2906: ata eva na tadabhāvo 'pi sādhyavyatirekaheturityata āha - teṣāmapīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2912: tiraścāmapyadhikāre 'pi na virodhaḥ nanu kathamavirodhastiryakṣu sarvatra vedādhikāre mānavirodhāpātādityata āha - teṣāmapīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2923: ata eva sautramanuṣyapadasya vyāvarttyasaṅkoco 'pi yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2930: teṣāmadhikāraniṣedhasya taddarśanasya vā virodhitvādityāśaṅkya nādya ityāha - niṣedheti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2934: na kevalaṃ yena śūdrādau vyabhicāraḥ syāditi sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:2941: ityādinā jaritārisārisṛkkastambamitradroṇākhyeṣu pakṣiṣu madhye jaritāriragrajaḥ svabhrātṛbhirasmānmocayeti prārthitaḥ 'ayamagne jaritā'; (ṛ.10-142-1.)
GSP33bbdip13u:2948: dṛśyante hītyanena - devā vedavidyādhikāriṇaḥ niṣedharāhitye sati viśiṣṭabuddhyādimattvāt tādṛśamartyavaditi siddhāntyabhimatānumāne manuṣyatvopādhirnirasto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:2956: tatra yadi manuṣyāḥ santo devādayo bhavanti tatpūrvaṃ devatābhāvāddevatoddiṣṭakarmaṇi virodha iti cet -
GSP33bbdip13u:2958: devānāṃ vedavidyādhikārasiddhyarthaṃ taduparītyanenoktaṃ sāditvamākṣipya samādadhatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā'kṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - virodha iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2960: devādipadayogyā jīvāḥ pūrvaṃ bhūmau kiñcitkālaṃ manuṣyāḥ santa eva atha devādayo bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:2964: kuta ityatastatpakṣe bādhakoktiparaṃ virodha ityaṃśaṃ sahetukaṃ vyācaṣṭe - tatrayadīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2969: yadvā - manuṣyā eva devādayo bhavantītyuktyā prāptābhedaśaṅkāṃ vārayituṃ manuṣyā evetyādisvapadāni varṇayati - tatreti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2975: tathā ca yadi pūrvaṃ manuṣyāḥ santo 'pyatha devādayo bhavantītyuktamityucyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:2977: tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ teṣāṃ devādipadaprāpteḥ pūrvaṃ sādhakatvāvasthāyāṃ 'devatābhāvāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:2978: devatāyā asattvāt yena karmaṇā devāditvaṃ sādhyamityuktam,
GSP33bbdip13u:2991: yojanā tu - na karmaṇi virodha, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:2994: na ca tatra pramāṇābhāva ityataḥ prāptamaneketyaṃśaṃ pratipattiśabdasya jñānārthatvabhramaṃ vārayan tatsambandhipradarśanapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe - anekeṣāmiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:2999: tathā sati yena karmaṇā devāditvaṃ sādhyamityuktam,
GSP33bbdip13u:3000: tatra karmaṇi śabde ca virodhastasya vaiyarthyaṃ syāt tatpūrvaṃ devatābhāvāditi cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:3029: ṛjavo brahmamukhyā hi suparṇaśśeṣa eva ca /
GSP33bbdip13u:3032: na ca vasurudrādityamarutsādhyeṣu vasūnāmāditvāt ṭīkāyāṃ vasvādidevā iti vaktavyam,
GSP33bbdip13u:3034: ata eva tattvapradīpe 'pūrve sādhyāḥ vasvādayo devāḥ pūrvasiddhā muktā vā';
GSP33bbdip13u:3039_0: ye padaṃ prāpya jagaddhārakā abhūvan te devā yajñena yajñamayajanta te ha nākaṃ mokṣagatātiśayaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:3039_1: sacante iti śruterarthāntaravivakṣayā tadupapattestadanusāreṇa taṭṭīkāyāṃ vyākaraṇasyāpyupapatteśca /
GSP33bbdip13u:3049: tadākṣipya samādadhatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā'kṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - śabda iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3052: tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - yadyanekeṣāṃ pūrvapūrvamuktyā devatāpadaprāpterdarśanānna karmaṇi virodha iti ucyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:3053: tarhi tatraiva śabde darśanapadokte vede 'prāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3056: nanu devānāmanityatve 'pi vedānāmaprāmāṇyaṃ kuta ityataḥ - taduditānāmityāha /
GSP33bbdip13u:3059: nanu devānāmanityatve 'pi na tadvācakavedasya vācyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:3060: devavadvācakavedasyāpyanityatvena kadāpi vācyahīnatvābhāvādityata uktaṃ - vedasya nityatvāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:3061: vedasya nityatvameva kuta ityata uktaṃ - vāceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3072: nanu vedasyānityatve 'pyāptimūlatvena prāmāṇyaṃ sambhavatītyata āha - āptyaniścayāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:3074: tathā ca kartuḥ sārvajñādau mānābhāvena vedakartuḥ sārvajñādirūpāptyaniścayādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3076: tathāpi na vede tanmūlatvaniścaya ityāha - āptyaniścayāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:3083: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - prāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ vedasyāptapraṇītatve mūlapramāṇena bhāvyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3095: tathā tasya nityatve 'pyāptoktatvarūpaguṇajanyatvābhāvena prāmāṇyābhāvāpattiriti samaṃ bādhakamityata āha - svata iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3104: tathā ca vedasya nityatvasya siddhatvāttadvācyadevānāmanityatve vācyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyāpattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3109: nanvatītakalpe ekadevatābhāve devatāntarasadbhāvādyathā karmaṇyuddeśyābhāvanimitto virodho nāsti,
GSP33bbdip13u:3110: tathātrāpyekadevatānāśe 'pi punaranyadevatotpattisambhavānna vācyahīnatvākhyo virodha ityata āha - punaranyabhāvaniyamābhāvācceti/
GSP33bbdip13u:3116: anenottarakāle devatābhāvavirodhaḥ karmaṇyapi samāna iti sautraśabdaśabdena karmāpyupalakṣaṇīyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3118: 'tadupari'; itisūtrādaperanukarṣokteḥ tasya ca na kevalaṃ śabde uttarakāle devatābhāvavirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3132: tatra yadyapi virūpeti svātmānaṃ prati sambodhanamityukteḥ viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ virūpākhyaṛṇessambodhanamityukteśca virodho bhāti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3134: uktaṃ hi tattvapradīpe - prerayeti prārthanaṃ virūpasya ṛṣerantaryāmiviṣayamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3135: virūpakartṛkaṃ taduddeśyakaṃ sambodhanamiti pakṣe 'pi svātmaśabditasvajīvaṃ pratisambodhanamiti ṭīkārthābhyupagamānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3137: na ca padmanābhatīrthakṛtaviṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ nyāyaratnāvalyāṃ dharmeṇa virūparṣiṃ pratyetaducyata ityuktatvāttadvirodha iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3138: prathamaṃ yamadṛṣṭasya mantrasyānantaraṃ virūpeṇāpi dṛṣṭatvasambhavena tadā svasambodhanasambhavenāvirodhāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3139: tathā ca he virūpa abhito dyauḥ prakāśo yasyāsāvabhidyuḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3142: tattvapradīparītyā vṛṣā śreṣṭhastasya caturthī vṛṣṇe iti vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3153: ityādeḥ, ata eva śabdātteṣāṃ prabhavaniyamāt mahatāṃ pratyakṣāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3158: kuta ityataḥ prāptaṃ prabhavāditi hetuṃ tatsambandhipradarśanapūrvakaṃ pravāhataḥprabhavaniyamaparatayā ca vyācaṣṭe - teṣāṃ prabhavaniyamāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:3162: tathā ca devānāṃ svarūpeṇa nityatvābhāve 'pi pravāharūpeṇa nityatvānna tadvācakavedāprāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3163: nanu pramāṇābhāvādasiddho heturityataḥ prāptamataḥśabdamanūdya sāvadhāraṇatvena vyācaṣṭe - ata eva śabdāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:3172: ato na devaprabhavaniyamaṃ pramāpayatītyato 'pyāha - ata eveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3173_0: tathā ca dhātā yathā pūrvakalpe sūryācandramasāvakalpayat tathāsminkalpe 'pīti pratikalpaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:3173_1: śrutyā kathane devānāṃ sarvakalpeṣu prajananākhyasadbhāvasiddheradhyāhāraṃ vinā ataevaśabdāt
GSP33bbdip13u:3173_2: buddhisthāt yathaiveti spaṣṭaśrutyantarācca teṣāṃ sarvakalpeṣu prabhavasiddhernoktacodyāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3174: nanu śrutāvupacāreṇāpyuktiḥ sambhavatīti na tayā devaprabhavaniyamaniścaya ityataḥ prāptaṃ pratyakṣetyaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - mahatāmiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3179: dṛśyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu //
GSP33bbdip13u:3189: nanvayogināṃ śrutipratyakṣayoraviśvāsena teṣāṃ devaprabhavaniścayābhāva ityataḥ prāptamanumānetyaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - yatheti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3190: idānīntanakāle yathā devāssanti tathoparibhāvikāle 'pi devā bhaviṣyantītītareṣāṃ mahadbhyo 'nyevāmayogināmanumānādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3199: ityādiśrutau nityatayā siddhe vede karmaṇi cottarakalpe vācyoddeśyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ syāditi cet - na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:3211: tathā mahadbhyaḥ itareṣāmayogināmanumānācca tatsiddheriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3212: 'yathaiva'; iti śrutyarthastu - yathā pūrvayugātyaye kalpātyaye vā punaryugakalpāntarotpattiriti kāle prabhavaniyamaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3231: ata eva śabdasya nityatvādeva ca devapravāhanityatvaṃ yuktam // 29//
GSP33bbdip13u:3233: yuktyantareṇa devapravāhasya nityatāṃ sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - ataeveti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3247: atrāpi bhāṣye caśabdena ca tadvācyadevatāsvarūpasyaiva nityatvena anyathopapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3252: ataeva svarūpanityatvāyogena pravāharūpeṇaiva teṣāṃ nityatvāvaśyaṃbhāvādityādiṭīkoktārthaḥ sarvo 'pi saṅgṛhītaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3262: tathā hi - kiṃ pūrvakalpe muktā eva devā uttarakalpe punarāvartante, tadanye vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3269: vācyadevānāṃ ca nānāvidhanāmarūpavattvādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - samāneti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3285: ma tadvācake ekavidhe 'pi śabde vede 'prāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3287: samāne ekavidhe nāmarūpe yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3289: candrikāyāṃ tu - sūtre bhāṣye ca tattvapradīpānusārādāvṛttāviti vicchedaṃ bhāṣye muktyāvṛttāvityasyaikapadyaṃ cāśritya ekasya padaprāptāvanyasya muktiḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3290: punastasya muktau punaranyasya padaprāptiriti krameṇa mukterāvṛttāvapīti vā,
GSP33bbdip13u:3297: nanu sarvadevānāṃ samānanāmarūpatve pramāṇābhāvādasiddho heturityataḥ prāptaṃ darśanādityaṃśaṃ vyākhyāti -yatheti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3308: kiṃ ca devapravāhasya nityatve teṣāṃ samānanāmarūpatve vā na tadvācitvena nityavedaprāmāṇyopaptiḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3311: ataḥ paramenaṃ vakṣyāmīti vimṛśya vṛttiḥ sambhavatītyataḥ prāptaḥ smṛterityaṃśa ityāśayena tāṃ darśayati - anādīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3332: tāneva śabdān teṣu saṅketitavān pratikalpamayaṃ śabdo 'tra śakta iti jñāpitavān /
GSP33bbdip13u:3333: 'yāśca'; ṛṣīṇāṃ devānāṃ vedeṣūktāḥ dṛśyante iti dṛṣṭayo rūpāṇi,
GSP33bbdip13u:3334: tāśca tāni ca tathaiva pūrvakalpīyarūpasādṛśyenaiva nirmame iti smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3339: anena - prācīnānāṃ devānāṃ muktyā punaḥ svapadeṣvavṛttāvapi tadanyeṣāṃ tatra vṛttāvapi na tadvācake ekavidhe 'pi śabde 'prāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3346: atra tattvapradīpe pralaye kasyāpi devasyābhāvena tadā vedasya vācyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyamāśaṅkya bhagavanmātraviṣayatvena tadupapattiriti samādhānamabhipretya 'śabde';
GSP33bbdip13u:3356: yathā yena prakāreṇedānīṃ devā bhavanti tathānyadāpītyanumānācca tadavagamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3361: samānāni sadṛśāni nāmāni yeṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ tāni tathoktāni,
GSP33bbdip13u:3362: tādṛśāni rūpāṇi yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvastasmāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3368: yathā pūrvaṃ pūrṇajñānaḥ sarvasvatantraḥ sarvanāmarūpasthitastathaiva sa dhātā sūryādīnakalpayaditi śruteḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3369: ataḥ sūryādikḷpteḥ prāgapi pralaye śabdaprāmāṇyāvirodha iti siddhamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3383: tathā hi dvividhā vedavidyāḥ - muktiphalārthāstaditaraphalārthā iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3389_0: tatsādhyānāṃ mokṣetaraphalānāṃ madhye keṣāñcidyogyānāṃ prāptatvena ayogyānāṃ ca prāptumaśakyatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:3401: yadvā - prāptapadānāmityatratyaṃ padānāmityetadbuddhyā vivicyātra dharmitvena sambadhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3415: tathā cetthaṃ bhāṣyayojanā - madhvādividyāsu 'asau vā ādityo devamadhu';
GSP33bbdip13u:3416: iti prastutyāmnātena 'sa etadevāmṛtaṃ veda vasūnāmevaiko bhūtvā agninaiva mukhenaitadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati';
GSP33bbdip13u:3425: prāptumayogyaphalatvāt tatrāpyarthitvāsambhavātteṣāṃ madhvādividyāsu 'anadhikāram anadhikārābhāvaṃ jaiminirmanyata'; iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3426: jaiminigrahaṇena āptatamena jaimininaivaṃ matatvācca na teṣāmadhikāra iti yuktyantaraṃ sūcyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3431: taistadvidyāsūktaphalānāṃ madhye keṣāñcidyogyānāṃ prāptatvena keṣāñcitprāptumayogyatvena teṣāṃ tatrārthitvāsambhavāditi āptatamo jaiminirmanyata iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3433: ityanena ādityasya viṣṇoḥ paramānandatvena madhutvamuktvā 'sa etat';
GSP33bbdip13u:3446: evaṃ 'yo'; devatvayogyo adhikārī vākprāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanohṛdayanāmakaṃ brahmopāste sa devatvamapyeti tato 'devo bhūtvā';
GSP33bbdip13u:3447: svottamadeveṣu sāyujyaṃ prāpya devān śvetadvīpagatabhagavadrūpaviśeṣān caturmukhabrahmaṇā sahāpyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3464: tatrārthitvasambhavāt ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - jyotiṣīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3469: yatkiñcidviṣayake jñāne viṣayatayā sarvabhāvasyāsiddhatvāt tajjñāpanāya sarvajñatva iti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3470: tena sūtre vastūnāmityantarbhāvasambandhijñāpakaṃ padamadhyāhāryamiti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3472: asya hetorasambhavādityanuvṛttahetudvārā madhvādiṣu anadhikāraṃ manyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3475: saptamī ca caitrarathasya buddhau śāstrārtha itivat yujyate iti sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3476: kathaṃ vastūnāṃ jñāne antarbhāva ityataḥ sarvajñatve bhāvāditi svapade varṇayati - āditya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3477: sarvavastūnāmādityaprakāśe antarbhāvavat tadgṛhītatvavat tajjñāne taduparīti prastutadevatākartṛkajñāne sarvavastūnām 'antarbhāvāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:3490: tathā ca na devānāmubhayavidyāsādhyajñāne 'rthitā sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3492: na cāsya hetoḥ pūrvasūtroktāsambhavahetūpapādakatvāt kathamatra caśabda iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3493: pūrvaṃ phalamukhena atra ca sādhanamukhena arthitvāsambhavasya abhipretatvena asya hetordvitīyāsambhavopapādakatve 'pi asambhavasāmānye upapādakatvena caśabdopapatteḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3496: uta mokṣaphalārthāyāṃ vidyāyāmadhikāra iti pakṣadvaye 'pi sādhānamukhena doṣoktiparatayā pratīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3502: tathāpi mokṣetaraphalakavidyāsvanadhikāra iti prācīnapakṣe na kevalaṃ madhuvidyāphale vasutvādau prāptatvāt devānāmarthitvābhāvāt tadvidyāyāmadhikārābhāvo doṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3503: kintu vasutvādiphalasādhanajñāne 'pyarthitvābhāvāt adhikārābhāva ityasambhavadoṣe upapādakāntaramuktaṃ bhavatīti ṭīkāyāmuktatvānna visaṃvādaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3506: hetvantareṇa etatsādhayatīti sattarkadīpāvalī ca ādyapakṣavivakṣayā pravṛttā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3508: anena - na kevalaṃ mokṣetaraphalārthaṃ madhvādiṣvanadhikāraṃ manyate jaiminiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3509: kintu ādiśabdena vā āvṛttajyotiśśabdena vā gṛhītāyāṃ 'satyaṃ jñānam';
GSP33bbdip13u:3517: na kevalaṃ vasvādidevānāṃ phale 'rthitvābhāvāt madhvādiṣvanadhikāraṃ jaiminirmanyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:3522: sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ viṣayatayā antarbhāvātphalasādhanajñānasya siddhatvāditi yāvaditi vā sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3531_0: evaṃ devairmokṣetarayogyaphalānāṃ prāptatvāt ayogyānāṃ prāptumaśakyatvāt mokṣasyāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:3531_1: brahmajñānitvena arthato labdhatvādarthitvābhāvena teṣāṃ kāsvapi vidyāsu adhikārābhāve
GSP33bbdip13u:3531_2: jaiminimatāvalambinā samarthite punaradhikāraṃ samarthayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhāvamiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3545: astītyasya kartṛsāpekṣatvāt taṃ darśayati - prakāśaviśeṣa iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3548: tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - bādarāyaṇastu bhagavān devānāṃ madhvādyaśeṣavidyāsu adhikārabhāvaṃ manyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3551_1: jñānamātreṇa asādhyasya mokṣaphale atiśayasya bhāvāt siddherarthitvasambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3552: na ca phale 'tiśayasya siddhatvena tatrārthitvasambhave 'pi tatsādhanavidyānāṃ nityasiddhatvāt vidyāvicārasya jñānārthatvāt tatrārthitvāsambhava iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3563: sarvaṃ vidhīyate nityaṃ sarvayajñādikarma ca / iti skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:3565_1: devānāṃ bhavatītyetat kuto jñāyate ityāśaṅkāṃ parihartumuktārthe hiśabdasūcitāṃ smṛtiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:3587: ata eva vidyāvicāreṇa sādhyasya prakāśasya jñānaviśeṣasya sambhavāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:3599: ekaśabdo avadhāraṇārtho viriñcasyāpi varjyatvanivārakaḥ skānde uktamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3600: ataḥ phalaviśeṣabhāvādasti hi prakāśaviśeṣa ityanayornāsiddhiriti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3607: uktaṃ ca tat phalaṃ ca uktaṃ phalaṃ yasyeti ca vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3608: tathā ca tattadvidyoktaphalārthaṃ tatphalakaprāgāptajñānārthaṃ ca yo 'yamadhikārastadabhāvamātraṃ 'jaiminimatam';
GSP33bbdip13u:3611: kimato yadyevamityata āha - ata iti jaiminyuktasya sūtrakāreṇāpyaṅgīkṛtatvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:3612: sūtrakṛduktasya ca jaimininā anirastatvānna tayorvirodhaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3620: nanu kimanayormatayorviṣayavailakṣaṇyakalpanena virodha eva kiṃ na syādityata āha - sarvajñasyeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3626: vicintitārthaikadeśaṃ tanmataikadeśameva svīkṛtya tadeva brūyuḥ, nānyat /
GSP33bbdip13u:3628: teṣāṃ kṛṣṇamunīnāṃ mataṃ parasparaṃ na viruddhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3630: ato viṣayavailakṣaṇyameva kalpyaṃna matavirodha iti bhāvaḥ // 8 //
GSP33bbdip13u:3657: nanu pautrāyaṇākhyapuruṣasya śūdratvameva kuta ityataḥ tajjñāpakamāha - aha hāretvā śūdreti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3660: nanvadhikārābhāve 'pi pautrāyaṇo vedavidyāṃ vicārayāmāseti kiṃ na syādityatopyāha - pautrāyaṇokteriti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3661: pautrāyaṇaṃ prati raikkeṇa nispṛheṇa muninā saṃvargavidyopadeśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3669: chāndogye caturthādhyāye saṃvargaprakaraṇe hītthamākhyāyikā - pautrāyaṇo nāma rājā prāsādāgre niśāyāṃ śayāno 'bhūt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3671: uparipatatāṃ parasparaṃ vārtāṃ kurvatāṃ teṣāṃ madhye dvāvagragāmināvāstām /
GSP33bbdip13u:3675: evamuktaḥ paro haṃsaḥ kamityākṣepavacanena rājānamanādṛtya raikvamunimeva praśaśaṃsa /
GSP33bbdip13u:3676: tacchrutvā paritaptamanā rājā talpādutthitastvarayā svasārathimāhūya raikvagaveṣaṇāyādideśa /
GSP33bbdip13u:3677: sa tatra tatra raikvamanviṣyan nāvidamiti prathamamāgataḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3678: punastallakṣaṇoktipūrvakaṃ rājñā tanmārgaṇāyādiṣṭaḥ punaranviyaṣya kvacitpradeśe raikvamavalokya punā rājānaṃ pratyetyāha - raikvamavidamiti yathāvṛttamavadat /
GSP33bbdip13u:3679: tadā rājā svasārathivacanena raikvamunisthānaṃ niścitya tasmāttattvaṃ vividiṣurgurudakṣiṇāṃ gṛhītvā tatsamīpaṃ jagāma /
GSP33bbdip13u:3680: atha dvāri śakaṭasyādhasthāt sthitaṃ raikvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambodhya dakṣiṇāṃ nivedya mahyaṃ vidyāṃ brūhītyuvāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:3681: tadā taṃ pautrāyaṇaṃ paro lokavilakṣaṇo raikvaḥ pratyācakhyau /
GSP33bbdip13u:3684: hāra itveti bhinnapadatve visargalope guṇe hāretveti bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3685: tathā ca he śūdra hāraḥ kaṇṭhamālākhyaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ itvā rathaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3687: gobhissaha tavāstvityarthaḥ hāretvānāvityekapadatvapakṣe dvivacanasya ekavacanādeśo vā ākārādeśo vā kartavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3700: pūrvapakṣyuktaliṅgadarśanasya anyathopapattipradarśanāya pravṛttasya tadādravaṇādityasya anvayayogyārthākāṃkṣotthāpakaṃ sūtrasya phalitārthaṃ darśayati - neti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3704_0: tarhi kathamasya śūdreti sambodhitatvaṃ yujyate rūḍhyabhāvādityato yogādevetyāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:3704_1: tacchabdapravṛttinimittapradarśakaṃ tadādravaṇāditi sūtrāṃśaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ matvā vyācaṣṭe - śuceti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3708: anena tadādravaṇādityasya sūtre śūdratvamityadhyāhṛtena śūdreti sambodhitatvarūpārthabodhakena padenānvayaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3709: tathā ca na sambodhanānupapattiriti nedaṃ śūdrasya vedavidyādhikāre liṅgamityato na śūdrasya vedavidyādhikāra iti nañāvṛttyā anvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3710: evetyanena ayaṃ śūdraśabdaḥ śucādravaṇācchūdra iti nairukta eva,
GSP33bbdip13u:3712: ityuṇādisūtreṇa rapratyaye dhātoścadīrghe cakārasya dakārādeśe ca niṣpanno rūḍha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3716: bhāṣye 'saḥ'; iti śrutyanusāreṇa asāviti parokṣeṇoktiśca yuktā /
GSP33bbdip13u:3722: kasmānnimittādasya śoka ityasyottaratayā pravṛttaṃ śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāditisūtrakhaṇḍaṃ vyācaṣṭe - kamvara iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3730: evaṃ vaktuṃ raikva eva yogya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3737: tathā ca ityevaṃrūpasya haṃsakṛtānādarabodhakavākyasya haṃsāt svānādaravākyasya vā śravaṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3745: nanu śrutānādarasyāpi rājñaḥ kuḥ śokotpattiḥ jñāyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3756: ityetadvākyārthānyathānupapattyā jñātena raikve vyāsaktamanaskatvena kāryeṇa tatkāraṇaṃ śugasya 'sūcyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:3758: kāraṇasya kāryāvinābhāvābhāve 'pi kāryasya kāraṇāvinābhāvasyāvaśyaṃ bhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3759: asya tadanādarasya śravaṇāt prāptayā śucā'dravaṇameveti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3766: ityasmāt kvipi rūpametat tathātve yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3767: nanu sūtre taddravaṇādityetāvatā pūrtau āṅpraśleṣaḥ kimartha iti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:3768: śrutau śūdretivaktavyatve 'pi śokādhikyajñāpanārthaṃ śūdreti ūkārarūpo yo dīrghasvaraḥ śrutaḥ tadarthavyaktavyarthatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3769: na ca śūgdretivaktavye śrutau śūdretyuktiḥ kathamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3776: raikvaṃ prati śīghragamanādeva nimittādasya pautrāyaṇasya śūdratvaṃ śūdreti sambodhitatvam,
GSP33bbdip13u:3786: parabuddheḥ śokapadoktaduḥkhānubhavasya apratyakṣatvādityata uktaṃ - sūcyate hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3788: iti vākyārthānupapatyā jñātena tadvyagramanaskatvākhyakāryeṇa tatkāraṇaṃ śugasya 'sūcyate'; jñāyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:3789: tasmāt ato na śūdreti sambodhanaṃ śūdrasya vedādhikāre liṅgamiti naitadbalācchūdrasya vedavidyādhikāra iti bhāvaḥ iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3801: tathā ca pautrāyaṇanidarśanenaiva śūdrasya vedavidyādhikārasiddhirityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - kṣatriyatveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3805: tathā ca uttaratra raikvaṃ prati pautrāyaṇasya ādravaṇāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:3809: pautrāyaṇena dīyamānasya rathasya anyadīyatvaśaṅkānirāsāya sūtre caitraratheneti bhāvapradhānapadaṃ prayuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3811: tatra citraścāsau rathaśca citrarathaḥ tasyāyaṃ caitraratha iti vigrahamabhipretya pratyayārthaṃ pradarśayan tadvyācaṣṭe - citrarathasambandhitveneti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3821: iti ṣaṣṭhyā itvāśabdārtharathasambandho gamyata iti tasyāśca rathasambandhe śrutirūpatvāt yuktamuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3822: citro ratho yasyeti citrarathastasya bhāvaḥ caitrarathasteneti vyākhyānaṃ tu bhāve 'ṇ pratyayasya kalpyatvāt śrutibhāṣyaviruddhatvācca ayuktam/
GSP33bbdip13u:3823: na ca caitraratheneti sambandhoktimātreṇa kathamanyadīyatvaśaṅkānirāsa iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3824: svataḥ prāptatadīyatve bādhakābhāve tadīyatvasyaiva svābhāvikatvasambhave naimittikagrahaṇāyogāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:3827: rathena liṅgādityanayossāmānādhikaraṇyāya liṅgāditi pañcamī vyatyayena vyācaṣṭe - liṅganeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3829: kṣatriyatvāvagaterityasya śucā'dravaṇādevāsya śūdratvaṃ na tu rūḍhyeti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3833: liṅgasya śrutitaścaramatvena anekatvena ca prābalyasūcanāya vā caśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3835: evaṃ ca rūḍhereva prābalye 'pyatra śrutānekaliṅgarūpabādhakāt śūdraśabdasya yogavṛttyaṅgīkāra eva yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3840: tadyukto rathaḥ aśvatarīrathaḥ tava dakṣiṇātvena vartate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3846_0: nanu śrutāvaśvatarīrathaśabdaprayogāt sūtre 'pi tathaiva prayoktavye kathaṃ sūtrakṛt
GSP33bbdip13u:3846_1: citrarathaśabdaṃ prāyuṅtetyāśaṅkya ubhayorarthaikyānna visaṃvāda ityāśayena tatrābhidhānamāha - ratha iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:3851: tathā ca sūtre rathatvaprakārakabodhāya rathaśabdaprayoga iti na tadvaiyarthyamiti dhyeyam iti brāhme uktatvāt na śrutisūtrayorvairūpyamityupaskāreṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3854: yatra vedo rathastatra na vedo yatra no rathaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3857: evaṃ sākṣādeva svābhāvikarathena pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvaṃ prasādhitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3858: svābhāvikarathitve 'sya varṇāvaratvaṃ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkya maivam-āgantukasyāpi rathasya vedaṃ vināyogāt 'vedasya ca saṃskāreti vakṣyamāṇanyāyena śūdre 'yogāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:3859: rathamātreṇa vedānumānadvārā pautrāyaṇasya śūdratvābhāvasiddherityāśayena rathena vedānumāne vyabhicāraśaṅkāparihārāya āgamenobhayavyāptiṃ darśayati - yatreti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3861: tena yatra vahniḥ tatraiva dhūma ityādāviva vedasya vyāpakatālābhaḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:3862: ata eva vyatirekapradarśakāṃśe na veda iti vedabhāvasya prathamamuktiḥ/
GSP33bbdip13u:3868: vastutastu - yatra rathastatra veda iti yojanāyāṃ nānupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3869: tathā ca anena vyāptiniścayāt na vyabhicāraśaṅketi yādṛśatādṛśarathamātreṇa vedānumānadvārā śūdratvābhāvaniścayānna pautrāyaṇasya vedabāhyavarṇāvaratvaṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3870: etena pūrvapakṣiṇā śūdre 'pi vedāṅgīkārānna tena śūdratvābhāvasādhanaṃ yuktamitinirastaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3872: na ca brāhmaṇādisādhāraṇarathitvenāsya vaidikatvaniścaye 'pi taddvārā aśūdratvasiddhāvapi kathaṃ kṣatriyatvaniścaya iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3874: tasya ca kādācitkarathavati brāhmaṇādāvabhāvāttena sākṣādeva kṣatriyatvaniścayopapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3876: ityanena prāptayoddhṛtvānyathānupapattyā śūdrasya rathitvapratītestatra vyabhicāra iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3878: brahmavaivarta ityasya uktatvādityadhyāhāreṇa nāsau śūdra ityanenānvayaḥ iti jñāyata iti śeṣaḥ anena - 'ādravaṇāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:3882: liṅgena svābhāvikarathena liṅgena bahudāyitvādiliṅgena cāsya pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvāvagateḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3885: tathā rathena vedaniścayācca nāsau śūdra iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:3897: na ca rathasya vedavyāpyatvācchūdre ca tadabhāvādrathasyāpyabhāva iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3919: kuta evaṃ kalpyata ityataḥ smṛtāvapyupanayanākhyadvitīyajanmavata eva sāraṇyaka vedādhyayanavidhānādityāśayena sūtre bhāṣye ca 'vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ sarahasyo dvijanmanā';
GSP33bbdip13u:3925: 'nāgnirna yajño na kriyā na saṃskāro na vratāniśūdrasya'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:3950: saṃskārābhāve 'pi tāsāmadhikāre śūdrasyāpi tatprāptirityata āha - uttameti /
GSP33bbdip13u:3957: tathā ca śacī yamīūrvaśyādyuttamastrīṇāṃ śūdravanna saṃskārābhāvena vedavidyādhikārasyābhāvo vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:3987: tathā ca saṃskārābhāvena hetunā yatsūtre vedādhikārasya abhāva uktaḥ saḥ 'sāmānyena';
GSP33bbdip13u:3992: tathā ca saṃskārābhāvena vedādhikārābhāva iti sāmānyavyāpteḥ śacyādiṣu vidyādhikāradarśanākhyāpavādakena bhaṅge 'pi na śūdrādāvapi tasya bhaṅgaḥ kalpyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:3997: strīṇāṃ pradānakarmaiva yathopanayanaṃ tathā / iti smṛteḥ // 36 //
GSP33bbdip13u:3999: evaṃ strīṇāṃ upanayanābhāve 'pi pūrvoktavyāpteḥ sāmānyatvena apavādasambhavādasti vedādhikāra ityuktam/
GSP33bbdip13u:4004: tathā ca puṃsāṃ yathā upanayanaṃ saṃskāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4009: tathā ca uttamastrīṣviha hetūkṛtasya vidhipratinidhisādhāraṇasaṃskārasāmānyābhāvasyābhāvāt na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4010: na ca saṃskāramātrasya vedādhikāraprayojakatve adhamastrīṇāmapi tadāpattiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4012: nanvevamuttamastrīṇāṃ saṃskārayuktatvādeva adhikāritvamiti noktanyāyabhaṅga iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:4013: kimarthaṃ tāsu saṃskārābhāvamaṅgīkṛtya uktanyāyasya sāpavādatvavacanamiti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip13u:4018_0: iti tacchabdena pūrvaprakṛtopanayanākhyasaṃskāramātrasya parāmarśādvedaḥ kṛtsna iti
GSP33bbdip13u:4018_1: smṛteścāsya śūdrasya tadabhāvābhilāpānnāgniriti śrutau saṃskārābhāvābhidhānāt na
GSP33bbdip13u:4018_2: tasya vedādhikāra iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4025: iti satyavacanena satyakāmasya śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe hāridrumatasya 'naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhati'; (chāṃ.4.5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4032: iti śrutau tu śūdrasya saṃskārābhāva evocyate na tu asau na kārya iti niṣidhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:4033: ato na tadvirodho 'pītyāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - tadabhāveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4037: tadākhyasya ṛṣeḥ etacca pūrvatrottaratra ca sambadhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:4039: ityādinā sūtre tacchabdo vyastaḥ anekavibhaktikaḥ buddhyā vivicyāvartate ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4042_1: śūdratvābhāveti tadabhāvapadavyākhyānena śrutau brāhmaṇaśabdo brahmāṇanayogyatraivarṇikapara ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4043: etadvākyasya yadyayamabrāhmaṇaḥ śūdraḥsyāttarhmetatsatyavacanaṃ ārjavavacanaṃ vāṅmanasayoravairūpyeṇa vacanaṃ vivaktuṃ nārhediti vipakṣe tarkoktirūpatayā,
GSP33bbdip13u:4044: yo 'brāhmaṇaḥ sa evaṃ vaktuṃ nārhati satyavacanahīna iti vyatirekavyāptyuktirūpatayā vā śūdratvābhaāvanirṇāyakatvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4048_0: tathā cetthaṃ mahāvākyayojanā - satyakāmasya nāhametadvedeti satyavacanena naitadabrāhmaṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:4050: pravṛttatvāt na śūdrasya tadabhāvaḥ saṃskāraniṣedhābhāva iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4052: anena - sūtre taditi vyastaṃ luptavibhaktikaṃ padaṃ samastaṃ ca tantreṇopāttam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4060: satyavacanena manovākkāyakarmaṇāṃ avaiparītyamārjavaṃ tadeva satyatvaṃ tādṛśavacanena tena jñāpitena ṛjutveneti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip13u:4061: naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhatīti vyatirekavyāptiṃ bādhakatarkaṃ copanyasya 'tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe ca';
GSP33bbdip13u:4062: tasya śūdratvābhāvanirṇaye satyeva tadabhāvamanumāyaiva 'samidhaṃ somyāharopa tvāneṣye'; (chāṃ. 4.4.5.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4063: iti tasya tasminnupanayanasaṃskāre tasya gautamasya pravṛtterdarśanācca na śūdrasya tadabhāvaḥ saṃskāraniṣedhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4064: śūdrasya upanayananiṣedhābhāve kathamayaṃ tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe satyeva pravarteta,
GSP33bbdip13u:4065: te jñāyate niṣedho 'stīti bhāva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4066: chāndogye hītthamākhyāyikā - satyakāmo nāma ṛṣiḥ jabālākhyaṃ mātaramupetyovāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:4067: kimiti? ahaṃ vedādhyayanārtham ācāryamupagaccheyaṃ tatrādhyayanasyopanayanasaṃskārasāpekṣatvāt upanayanaṃ vinā te māṃ nādhyāpayeyuḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4068: upanayanaṃ ca gotrādyavacane na kuryuḥ ato 'haṃ kiṃ gotro 'smi tadvadeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4069: evamuktā jabālā svaputraṃ satyakāmamabravīt - he tāta tvaṃ yadgotro 'sītyetat nāhaṃ vedeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4072: evamukto gautamaḥ he somya tvaṃ kiṃgotro 'si?
GSP33bbdip13u:4074: evamuktassatyakāmaḥ punargautamaṃ pratyāha - nāhametadveda bho iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4075: bho bhagavan pūjya gautama ahaṃ yadgotro 'smītyetat vedyaṃ 'na veda';
GSP33bbdip13u:4077: evaṃ satyakāmasya satyavacanenārjavaṃ jñātvā punastaṃ pratyuvāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:4087: ato he somya samidhamupahara tvāmupaneṣya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4100: anyathā tena devatādyadhikārasiddhirapi na syāditi śaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - śravaṇeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4107: tathā cāniṣiddhatve sati viśiṣṭabuddhyādimattvasyaiva vedādhikāraprayojakatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt tasya ca śūdre abhāvānna tasya devaprativandyā vedādhikāro vācya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4108: śūdreṇa vedaśravaṇe kṛte sati drutābhyāṃ trapujatubhyāṃ vaṅgalākṣābhyāṃ tatkarṇavivaraparipūraṇaṃ rājabhaṭaiḥ kāryamiti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4116: śrutau śūdreṇa śravaṇe kṛte ityanuktervarṇabāhyaviṣayeyaṃ śrutiḥ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkānivṛtyarthaṃ sūtre smṛteścetyuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4119: śūdreṇa nāgnissavathā ādhātavyaḥ pañcavidho yajño 'pi nānuṣṭheyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4121: tarhi tenānuṣṭheyaṃ paralokasādhanaṃ kimiti pṛcchati - tu kintviti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4129: iti smṛterityasya śūdrasyaivādhyayananiṣedhāvagamāt na tadabhāva ityadhyāhṛtenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4130: tathā ca spaṣṭasmṛtibalāt śruterapi śūdraviṣayatvameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4136: nanu śūdrasya vedārthāvadhāraṇāderniṣiddhatve kathaṃ vidurādīnāṃ vaidikārthāvadhāraṇamasti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4137: evaṃ saṃskārarahitānāṃ vedānadhikāre kathaṃ kṣatriyaḥ saṃskārarahitaḥ karṇaḥ nikhilāḥ śrutīradhijagau /
GSP33bbdip13u:4139: avihitopanayanatve sati niṣiddhādhyayanānāṃ uttamastrītiryagādīnāmevāpavādaviṣayatvena niṣiddhādhyayanānāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ atadviṣayatvādityata āha - vidurādīnāmiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4143: janmāntara eva vedātparamparayotpannamaparokṣajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāsteṣāṃ bhāvastattvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4149: kintu apavādaviṣayatvameveti na tatpratibandyetaraśūdrāṇāṃ vedādhikāraḥ śaṅkya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4152: iti spaṣṭaṃ śūdrasyaiva vedādhyayananiṣedhakasmṛteśca na tasya tadabhāvo vedādhyayananiṣedhābhāva iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4157: yadidaṃ kiñca jagatsarvaṃ prāṇa ejati nissṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4163: atra traivarṇikānāṃ vedāt brahmajñānaṃ mokṣadamiti pūrvoktamayuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4165: iti śrutau udyatavajrajñānāt mokṣaḥ śrūyata iti vākyopaskāreṇa yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4166: anena pūrvādhikaraṇe traivarṇikānāṃ vedāt brahmajñānaṃ mokṣadamiti yadabhipretaṃ tasya cānandamayādhikaraṇe 'netaraḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:4167: ityanenoktasya mokṣajanakajñānaviṣayatvasya viṣṇoranyatrākṣepāt tenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4171: iti śrutau ca āyudhe prasiddhodyatatvaliṅgabalāccendrāyudhamevedaṃ vajramiti sayuktikapūrvapakṣaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4174: prāṇa ityasya nimittasaptamītvaṃ vā vibhaktivipariṇāmaṃ vā āśritya āvṛttyā nissṛtamityanenāpi sambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4179: prāṇanānnimittāt prāṇaśabdavācye harau sthitaṃ prāṇānnissṛtaṃ tato jātaṃ ca taditaṃ sarvaṃ jagat 'yasmādejati';
GSP33bbdip13u:4191: yadvā - prāṇa iti prathamāntaṃ padaṃ tathā ca prāṇo mukhyaprāṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4192: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kiñcānyacchrutaṃ sarvaṃ jagacca yasmānnissṛtaṃ yasmādejati ca tadetadvajraṃ ye vidurityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4198: tathā ca yatkiñcijjagatsarvaṃ yadyasmānnissṛtaṃ sa mukhyaprāṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4200: atra prathamavyākhyāne mukhyaprāṇasya jagadantargatatvena bhagavatpreryatvaṃ dvitīye jagatsāmyena,
GSP33bbdip13u:4201: tṛtīye tu mukhyaprāṇasyaiva sākṣādbhagavatpreryatvaṃ jagatastu mukhyaprāṇapreryatvamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4217: na ca śrutau vākyabhedāṅgīkāre kampakatvaṃ vajre nocyata iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4219: udyatavajra iti sūtre śeṣoktiḥ samanvayasūtrādanuvṛttasya tadityasyoddeśyavajrapadānusārātprāṇapadānusārādvā bhagavāniti vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4231_0: nanu śrutiliṅgābhyāṃ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa nirṇaya ityato liṅgasya niravakāśatvādevetyāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:4231_2: sāmānyato jagacceṣṭakatvaliṅgasya viṣṇoranyatraniravakāśatvaṃ śrutyā darśayati - kohīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4232: hiśabdo hetau yata ityarthe prasiddhau vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4234: ato liṅgasya nānyatra sāvakāśatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4239_0: yadā sāmānyataḥ sarvajagacceṣṭakatvameva viṣṇvekaniṣṭhaṃ tadā kimu vaktavyaṃ śruteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:4239_2: jagacceṣṭakatvasya sarvathānyatrāyogāditi bhāvena tatra śrutiṃ darśayati - prāṇasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4245: tasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatvāsiddhiparihārāya tatra śrutiṃ pramāṇayati - prāṇasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4257: śruteḥ prathamavyākhyāyāmapi kaimutyavyaktikaraṇāya śrutyuktaprāṇaceṣṭakatvaṃ hetūkṛtya pravṛttāṃ smṛtimāha - nabhasvata iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:4261: tadā kimutānyasya preryasya vāyubhinnasya jagataśceṣṭā harerbhavantīti vaktavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4262: kuta etat? yato yasya jagataḥ ceṣṭā nabhasvato na bhavantyata iti vacanārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4272_1: prabalatvācca kathaṃ niravakāśenāpi sarvaceṣṭakatvaliṅgena vajro viṣṇureveti nirṇaya
GSP33bbdip13u:4283: tataḥ kim, eṣa iti ca kaḥ ityata āha - hetīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4286: hetīnāṃ cakrādisarvāyudhānāṃ yāni nāmāni mukhyavācyatayā tadvānityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4292: tena varjanādityuktayogasya rūḍherdairbalyāt ayoga iti nirastam/
GSP33bbdip13u:4293: na caivaṃ kāṭhakabhāṣye - vajravadbhayadaṃ ceti vajraśabdasya viṣṇau gauṇatvoktivirodha iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4303: tatra 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjotiḥ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ. 6.3.7.) iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4308: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca darśayati - hṛdaya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4310: nihitaṃ jyotiḥ tacchabdavācyaṃ sa paramātmeti jyotirnaye abhihitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4311: tataḥ kimityata āha - tatreti jyotirviṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4316: tathā cātra śrutaṃ jyotiḥ tacchabdavācyo jñānātmako jīva eveti pratīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:4320: iti vājasaneyavākyoktajyotiṣo viṣṇutvākṣepamukhena pūrvoktasyāpi tadākṣepāttenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ uktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4324: kiṃjñānasādhanaḥ jīvasya jñānasādhanaṃ kimiti janakena pṛṣṭo yājñyavalkyaḥ 'ādityajyotissamrāḍiti hovāca'; (bṛ. 6.3.2.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4330: iti jyotiṣṭvenokta ātmā katamaḥ kīdṛśa iti pṛṣṭo 'yo 'yam';
GSP33bbdip13u:4343: ātmapadaṃ sa iti padaṃ ca jīvaparaṃ ubhayalokasañcaraṇamapi karmādhīnaṃ vivakṣitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4383: tathā ca liṅgaṃ sāvakāśamiti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4385: prakarṣeṇa āsamantāt jñena prajña eva prājñaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4387: adhiṣṭhito jīvamāruhya gacchati bhagavāniti bṛhadbhāṣyokteḥ tadvāhanabhūtaḥ 'utsarjat';
GSP33bbdip13u:4408: anenātratyākāśaśabdasya viṣṇvanyatvaparatvoktimukhena pūrvoktasarvādhāratvasyāpi anyaniṣṭhatvākṣepāttenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4413: tathā ca chandogyaśrutyuktaḥ ākāśaḥ prasiddhaḥ sākṣisiddhaḥ avyākṛtākāśa evāṅgīkāryaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4416_0: iti vacanāt avakāśasyāpi nāmarūpavattvāditi candrikākṛdabhipretaṃ ṭīkāpāṭhamāśritya
GSP33bbdip13u:4424: yadvā - tacchabdena vācyaprapañcāntarbhūtaṃ nīlādirūpaṃ vācakaṃ nāma ca gṛhyate/
GSP33bbdip13u:4427: sākalyena nāmavācyaṃ prākṛtarūparahitaṃ ca yadvartate tadbrahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4430: yathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - nāmi ca rūpi ca yannabhavati tadbrahmeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4445: tathā ca tābhyāṃ nāmarūpābhyāṃ anyaḥ arthaḥ arthāntaraṃ yadvā tābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ arthāntaraḥ tasya bhāvastattvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4449: yadvā - nirapekṣayoreva nāmarūparāhityayorākāśasya brahmatvasādhakatvāt arthāntarapadena rūparāhityaṃ ādipadena nāmarāhityaṃ ca gṛhyate/
GSP33bbdip13u:4462: ākāśe śrutena nāmarūpatvādiliṅgena kuto viṣṇutvaniścaya ityatastasya tanniṣṭhatvāditibhāvena tatra pramāṇatayā ātharvaṇīṃ śrutimāha - avarṇamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4471: ityādiśruterityasya tasya viṣṇoretadarūpatvādikaṃ lakṣaṇamasādhāraṇadharma iti jñāyate ityadhyāhāreṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4472: hi yasmāttasmāt na liṅgasya vyadhikaraṇāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4480: tathāpi vācakasya nāmno vācyāpekṣayāprādhānyāt vācyasyaiva pradhānatvādvācyaprapañcāntargatarūparāhityaśrutireva prathamamudāhṛtetyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4504: tacca 'sa yattatra kiñcitpaśyananvāgatastena bhavatyasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ.6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4521: tataḥ kimityataḥ sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4525: kutaḥ taddraṣṭṛtvasya loke jīva eva prasiddhatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4527: iti tacchabdena 'sa vā eṣa etasmin samprasāde ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ prati yonyā dravati svapnāyaiva'; (bṛ. 6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4533: ramaṇaṃ kṛtvā jīvagataṃ puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva na tvanubhūya 'caritvā';
GSP33bbdip13u:4548: pūrvapakṣī tu śrautatacchabdena jīvaṃ gṛhītvā sarvaṃ vākyaṃ jīvaparatayā vyākhyāti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4555: 'prājñenātmanā sampariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram';
GSP33bbdip13u:4562: tena sūtre uddeśyavidheyapratipattyartham anuvṛttāvṛttasya tacchabdasya vipariṇāmassūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4563: tacchabdena gṛhītasyāpi samanvetavyaliṅgasya spaṣṭapratipattyarthaṃ svaśabdena nirdeśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4566: asaṅga ityapi hetusūcanāya sūtre adhyāhṛtaṃ padam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4567: jīvaḥ para ityanena suṣuptyutkrāntipadaṃ tatprakaraṇalakṣakamapi jīvaparamātmaparamapītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4569: utkrāntiśabdaḥ dehādutkrāmayitṛparaḥ tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ tasya paramātmana eva bhavet na jīvasya /
GSP33bbdip13u:4571: na ca svapnādidraṣṭuḥ asaṅgatvaśravaṇe 'pi kuto 'yaṃ viṣṇuriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4572: yato 'yamasaṅgaḥ karmābaddhatvāt paraḥ paramātmaiva na jīvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4573: tathā ca liṅgasya niravakāśatvāt nāprayojakatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4574: na ca jīve 'pir iśvarabhedena asaṅgatvoktiḥ sambhavatīti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4576: prājñeneti śrutyudāharaṇena sūtre suṣuptipadaṃ mokṣasyāpi grāhakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4577: tenāyaṃ bhedo vyāvahārika iti śaṅkānirāso 'pi bhavati/
GSP33bbdip13u:4578: suṣuptyutkrāntipadena ca tatprakaraṇaṃ lakṣyata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4583: samāśliṣṭaḥ supto muktaśca dehādbāhyamāntaraṃ ca kiñcana viṣayādikaṃ na vedeti prathamavākyārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4590: nanu kathamaśarīrasya svāpnādidarśanaṃ yuktaṃ syādityata āha - svapnādīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4594: tathā ca na kevalamasaṅgatvaṃ karmābaddhatvāt parasyaiva yujyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:4597: ataḥ tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ yujyate na jīvasya/
GSP33bbdip13u:4599: satyāśeṣārthajñatvāt svapnapadārthānāṃ jīvagatāvasthāyāśca satyatāyā vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4602: na ca 'dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca'; (bṛ.6.3.15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4604: yato 'tra ādipadagṛhītaṃ puṇyapāpādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ liṅgāntaraṃ ca tasyaiva yujyate ata iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4615: ata eva svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ ca tasyaiva vaktuṃ yujyate na jīvasyeti sūtrārthaḥ ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4625: devānāṃ ca vidyākarmaṇoḥ padaprāptiḥ sūcitā taduparyapīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4628: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati - eṣa iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4631: na kevalaṃ viṣṇoḥ api tu kasyacit brāhmaṇasyāpītyaperarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4632: idaṃ ca yo janmādyadhikaraṇeṣu viṣṇorananyāpekṣayā jagatsraṣṭṛtvoktyā abhisaṃhito nityamahimā saḥ 'eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:4633: iti vākye brāhmaṇasyāpi pratīyata iti yattacchabdādhyāhāreṇa yojyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4634: anena pūrvābhisaṃhitanityamahimatvasya viṣṇoranyasyāpyākṣepāt janmādyadhikaraṇaiḥ phalamukhena asyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4636: yadvā - devānāmiti vākyaṃ devatādhikaraṇapratipādyānuvādaparatvenāpi vyākhyāya tenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā draṣṭavyā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4638: iti sūtreṇa devānāṃ viriñcādyamarāṇāṃ vidyākarmaṇossakāśāt sādhyā yā nityapadaprāptiruktā, sā na yuktā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4644: tathā ca brāhmaṇasya viṣṇoreṣaḥ pūrvoktamahimā nityaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4645: kuto? yato 'yaṃ 'na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān'; (bṛ.6.4.22.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4647: pāpakarmaṇā tatphalena duḥkhena na hrasate iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4659: taduparīti sūtre devānāṃ vidyākarmabhyāṃ padaprāpteḥ samarthitatvena brāhmaṇe śrutanityamahimatvasya viriñce asambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:4663: tathā ca taduparīti sūtre viriñcetaradevānāmeva vidyākarmaṇoḥ sakāśāt padaprāptiḥ 'sūcitā';
GSP33bbdip13u:4666: tasyeśvararūpatvena devakoṭyapraviṣṭatvādato viriñcasya nityamahimattvaṃ yuktameveti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:4673: 'sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvasyeśānaḥ ... sa vā eṣa neti neti'; (bṛ. 6.4.21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4677: vājasaneyake sarvavaśitvavāciśabdasyaivāditvātsūtrasya tadvisaṃvādamāśaṅkya tatparihārāya sūtrānukūlatayā sadṛśaśākhāntaragatavākyodāharaṇapūrvakaṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - sarvasyeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4678: 'sarvasya'; brahmarudrādeḥ sakāśāt guṇairadhikaścāsau sarvasya patiḥ pālakaśceti sarvādhipatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4680: brahmādīnāṃ anaḥ preraka iti sarvasyeśāna iti śrutyantarārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4681: sarvavaśiśabdārthastu sarvamasya vaśe yasmāddhariḥ sarvavaśī tata iti bṛhadbhāṣyādavagantavyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4690: kuta ityataḥ 'ātmāgṛhyo na hi gṛhyate 'śīryo na hi śīryate 'saṅgo na hi sajjate 'sito na vyathate na riṣyati.........sa eṣa ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayaḥ'; (bṛ. 2.4.24.)
GSP33bbdip13u:4692: atrāgṛhya ityādirātmana iti netyuktārthe sākalyena agrāhyatvādirūpahetusamarpakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4702: ityādau śrutāḥ ye sarvādhipatyādivācakāḥ śabdāḥ tebhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4706_0: evaṃ hetuṃ vyākhyāya sūtre samanvayasūtrāt tattvityanuvartya vipariṇamyamānena tadityanenānvayayogyamuddeśyasamarpakaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:4706_1: nityamahimeti padaṃ cādhyāhṛtyāhatya niṣkṛṣṭāṃ pratijñāṃ darśayati - nityamahimeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4708: śabdebhya iti hetvanvayayogyaṃ sādhyaṃ tu brāhmaṇa ityadhyāhṛtaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4713: tathā ca nityamahimāpi sa eveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:4719: nanu sarvādhipatyādivāciśabdasadbhāve 'pi kuto brāhmaṇasya viṣṇutvaniścaya ityaprayojakatavaśaṅkāvāraṇāya tatra sarvādhipitvasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatve tāvacchrutimāha - uteti /
GSP33bbdip13u:4727: kutaḥ? yato yasmāt na kevalamamuktasarvādhipatiḥ puruṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:4734: mokṣasyar iśāna iti ceti arthāntaraṃ coktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:4741: muktāvanadhīnatve sarvajñasya buddhimataḥ svādhīnasaṃsāribhyo mokṣapradānāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:4758: 'hi'; yasmātte sarvādhipatyādiśabdāḥ ityavagatāḥ tasmāt nāprayojakatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
